name: JESUS MARY JOSEPH SOCIAL SERVICE SOCIETY (JMJSSS)
briefDescription: Jesus Mary Joseph Social Service Society,Mahabubnagar, a Catholic Christian Religious Minority Organization with its Head Quarters in Hyderabad,was established in India in the year 1904,to work for the educational development of all communities particularly the vulnerable women,Tribal’s,Dalits & the marginalized.The charisma “Ever adaptable apostolic availability, bequeathed to the society by our founder Fr. Mathias Wolff S.J. has enabled sisters to launch out into relevant social service activities in accordance with the signs of the times.All along the target has always been and is the poor, the needy, the oppressed, the voiceless etc.
